name: Chapin Bryce
body:
# Projects

## MantaRay

[Mantech's Triage and Analysis System](https://github.com/mantarayforensics/mantaray) automates many open source forensic tools to provide insight to points of analysis available within an unknown data set. 

![MantaRay Forensic Triage Suite](https://github.com/chapinb/chapinb.github.io/blob/c4520692174d09c3825d15459d2d8c7552a84dff/assets/img/work/img1.png)

## Google Glass Forensics

Published 3 articles within Digital Forensics Magazine with research on Google Glass. Developed [Shattered](https://github.com/chapinb/shattered) and [Foroboto](https://github.com/chapinb/foroboto) as acquisition & analysis tools for Google Glass and rooted Android based devices.

![Digital Forensics Magazine Cover Story](https://github.com/chapinb/chapinb.github.io/blob/c4520692174d09c3825d15459d2d8c7552a84dff/assets/img/work/img2.png)

## AnParser

[Android artifact parser](https://github.com/anparser/anparser) framework for Android analysis. Leverages the [Pandas](http://pandas.pydata.org/) framework to handle data manipulation from input files to output reports.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
